tool.name: ScriptManager: Expand GFF File
tool.description: Expands input GFF file by adding positions to the border or around the center.
tool.command:
ln -s '$input' file.gff && ln -s '$output' output.gff &&
java -jar $__tool_directory__/@JAR_FILENAME@ coordinate-manipulation expand-gff
#if str($expansion_select) == "center" : -c #else if str($expansion_select) == "border" : -b #end if
"$SIZE"
-o output.gff file.gff
tool.help:
**What it does**
Expand GFF file given user-defined criteria.
